definition: the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat, engage in deep thought, consideration, or debate
details:
noun
- the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat
= example: the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat
= synonyms: wrestling
verb
- engage in deep thought, consideration, or debate
= example: engage in deep thought, consideration, or debate
- combat to overcome an opposing tendency or force
= example: combat to overcome an opposing tendency or force
- engage in a wrestling match
= example: engage in a wrestling match
- to move in a twisting or contorted motion, (especially when struggling)
= synonyms: twist
